mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getShoppingCartProducts */ SELECT a.id 'id', a.customer_id 'customerId', (SELECT user_name FROM cmm_user WHERE user_id = a.customer_id) 'customer.userName', a.seller_id 'sellerId', (SELECT user_name FROM cmm_user WHERE user_id = a.seller_id) 'seller.userName', a.prod_id 'prodId', a.amount 'amount' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM shopping_cart a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.id = #{id} AND UPPER(a.customer_id) = UPPER(#{customerId}) AND UPPER(a.seller_id) = UPPER(#{sellerId}) AND a.prod_id = #{prodId} AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) ORDER BY a.create_datetime DESC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getProductSellers */ SELECT a.seller_id 'userId', b.user_name 'userName' FROM (SELECT DISTINCT seller_id FROM shopping_cart WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(customer_id) = UPPER(#{customerId}) ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN cmm_user b ON b.user_id = a.seller_id ORDER BY b.user_name ASC
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : modifyShoppingCartForNotNull */ UPDATE shopping_cart SET modify_datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , customer_id = TRIM(#{customerId}) , seller_id = TRIM(#{sellerId}) , prod_id = TRIM(#{prodId}) , amount = TRIM(#{amount}) WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteShoppingCart */ DELETE FROM shopping_cart WHERE 1 = 1 AND customer_id = TRIM(#{customerId}) AND seller_id = TRIM(#{sellerId}) AND id = TRIM(#{id})
